toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
helper1: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
helper2: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
helper3: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.

inputIsEstimated: Input is estimated. You will sell at most
confirmThisTransaction: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
liquidityHelper: Liquidity providers earn a 0.25% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
connectLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
dontSeePool: Don't see a pool you joined?
whenYouAddLiquidity: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
whenYouRemoveLiquidity: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
youAreFirst: You are the first liquidity provider.
theRadioOfToken: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
onceYouAreHappy: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
